component.name: Lithium-ion Capacitor
component.purpose: Used for storing charge used by the mote.

properties.property: High capacitance compared to a capacitor.
Operating temperatures ranging from (-20-70) degrees celcius
low self-discharge(less than 5% voltage drop at 25 degrees celcius).

component.description: A lithium-ion capacitor (LIC) is a hybrid type of capacitor classified as a type of supercapacitor. Activated carbon is typically used as the cathode. The anode of the LIC consists of carbon material which is pre-doped with lithium ions.
